channel.title: Trump Admin on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trump Admin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: FEMA's Chaotic Summer Has Gone From Bad to Worse
item.description: Following a week of strife at the disaster relief agency, Homeland Security secretary Kristi Noem told FEMA employees to “be vocal” about their positive experiences with the Trump administration.
